channel.title: link-dump on Alan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in link-dump on Alan's Blog

item.title: Link Dump 2018 June
item.description: Tech lunr.js - an full-text search library for javascript Flutter Studio - a simple web interface for building flutter UIs Cool Backgrounds - a quick tool for generating cool backgrounds How to implement your own “Hello, World!” boot loader - intro to 80886 assembly and qemu VGABIOS.TXT - set bios video mode DIY Making of Mech Kitbash Making of Mech Kitbash #2 Cyber Security Hacking Livestream #53: The ZIP file format - Zip file hacking corkami/pics - file format specs and posters Tools yafu - Automated integer factorization, great for cracking phi(n) in rsa NetworkMiner - only for windows, good for network forensics in ctf z3 - a theorem prover from Microsoft Research, great for RE angr - A powerful and user-friendly binary analysis platform, great for RE
